docs.text: Note for my audience Welcome to the Omit Rages psueduo-documentation site! Omit Rages is an anagram of Riot Games. I've created this site as a writing assignment for a technical writer position at Riot Games. I've used MkDocs to create this site and GitHub Pages to host it. The intention of this site is to mimic some developer Python SDK documentation. The Python SDK Quickstart tab above depicts a general SDK outline. The API Reference tab contains the bulk of the writing assignment. Thanks for reading. :)
docs.title: Home

The Python SDK Quickstart tab above depicts a general SDK outline. The API Reference tab contains the bulk of the writing assignment. Thanks for reading. :)

docs.text: API Reference Find a champion Description Retrieves champions, their name, role, and origin. Method To create a find_champion instance you can use the following function in the Python SDK: find_champion.name(String).role(String).origin(String) Parameter Type Required Defaults Description Name String Y N/A The champion's name. Role String N N/A The champion's role (e.g., top lane , support , or marksman ) Origin String N N/A The champion's origin (e.g., bilgewater , iona , etc). Request Syntax The following is the basic request syntax: def find_champion(name=None, role=None, origin=None): champion_suggestions = [] for champ in champion_data: if name: if champ['name'] == name: return [champ] if role: if champ['role'] != role: continue if origin: if champ['origin'] != origin: continue champion_suggestions.append(champ) return champion_suggestions Response Syntax The following list is a basic response syntax: {'name': 'ahri', 'role': 'mid lane', 'origin': 'vastaya'} otherEndpoint1 Sorte hinc domos murmure, te et, placuisse, umet. docs.text: Retrieves champions, their name, role, and origin.
docs.title: Description

docs.text: To create a find_champion instance you can use the following function in the Python SDK: find_champion.name(String).role(String).origin(String) Parameter Type Required Defaults Description Name String Y N/A The champion's name. Role String N N/A The champion's role (e.g., top lane , support , or marksman ) Origin String N N/A The champion's origin (e.g., bilgewater , iona , etc).
docs.title: Method

docs.text: The following is the basic request syntax: def find_champion(name=None, role=None, origin=None): champion_suggestions = [] for champ in champion_data: if name: if champ['name'] == name: return [champ] if role: if champ['role'] != role: continue if origin: if champ['origin'] != origin: continue champion_suggestions.append(champ) return champion_suggestions
docs.title: Request Syntax

docs.text: The following list is a basic response syntax: {'name': 'ahri', 'role': 'mid lane', 'origin': 'vastaya'}
